00006 ORXmlPlistString::ORXmlPlistString(size_t lengthToReserve) : std::string()
00007 { 
00008   reserve(lengthToReserve);
00009   Reset();
00010   /*Reset takes care of initializing fDictHasBeenLoaded*/
00011 }

00017 void ORXmlPlistString::Reset()
00018 {
00019   fDictHasBeenLoaded = false;
00020   clear();
00021   append("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC \"-//Apple Computer//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN\" \"http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd\"><plist version=\"1.0\">\n");
00022 }
00023 
00024 void ORXmlPlistString::LoadDictionary(const ORDictionary* aDict)
00025 {
00026   if(fDictHasBeenLoaded) Reset();
00027   LoadDictValue(aDict);
00028   ClosePlist();
00029   fDictHasBeenLoaded = true;
00030 }
00031 
00032 void ORXmlPlistString::LoadDictValue(const ORVDictValue* dictValue)
00033 {
00034   if(dictValue->GetValueType() == ORVDictValue::kDict) {
00035     const ORDictionary* dictValuePtr = 
00036       dynamic_cast<const ORDictionary*>(dictValue);
00037     append("<dict>\n");
00038     const std::map<const std::string, ORVDictValue*>* dictMap = 
00039       dictValuePtr->GetDictMap();
00040     std::map<const std::string, ORVDictValue*>::const_iterator dictMapIter;
00041     for(dictMapIter=dictMap->begin();dictMapIter!=dictMap->end();dictMapIter++) {
00042       append("<key>");
00043       append(dictMapIter->first);
00044       append("</key>\n"); 
00045       LoadDictValue(dictMapIter->second);
00046     }
00047     append("</dict>\n");
00048   } else if(dictValue->GetValueType() == ORVDictValue::kArray) {
00049     append("<array>\n");
00050     for(size_t i=0;i<dictValue->GetNValues();i++) {
00051       LoadDictValue(dynamic_cast<const ORDictValueA*>(dictValue)->At(i));
00052     }
00053     append("</array>\n"); 
00054   } else if (dictValue->GetValueType() == ORVDictValue::kInt) {
00055     append("<integer>");
00056     append(dictValue->GetStringOfValue());
00057     append("</integer>\n");
00058   } else if (dictValue->GetValueType() == ORVDictValue::kReal) {
00059     append("<real>");
00060     append(dictValue->GetStringOfValue());
00061     append("</real>\n");
00062   } else if (dictValue->GetValueType() == ORVDictValue::kString) {
00063     append("<string>");
00064     append(dictValue->GetStringOfValue());
00065     append("</string>\n");
00066   } else if (dictValue->GetValueType() == ORVDictValue::kBool) {
00067     append("<");
00068     append(dictValue->GetStringOfValue());
00069     append("/>\n"); 
00070   } 
00071 }
